content.raw:
Totally fine by me! Getting the baud rate was definitely annoying since the only way to know what the current baud rate is is to just try them all and see which one gives a sensible response.

We’ve been using this code without issue for almost a year now. The linked code appears to be up to date with all my bugfixes on that feature, but I won’t guarantee it since I recently ported everything over to the arbitrary subfolder architecture so code diffs are a little harder to track \(ie the linked file no longer exists in the mainline\). The spiritual successor is now [here](https://bitbucket.org/dihm/naqslab_devices/src/default/NovaTechDDS/blacs_worker.py).
content.html:
Totally fine by me! Getting the baud rate was definitely annoying since the only way to know what the current baud rate is is to just try them all and see which one gives a sensible response.

We’ve been using this code without issue for almost a year now. The linked code appears to be up to date with all my bugfixes on that feature, but I won’t guarantee it since I recently ported everything over to the arbitrary subfolder architecture so code diffs are a little harder to track (ie the linked file no longer exists in the mainline). The spiritual successor is now here.
